sources.title: His Wife's Mother
sources.description: Recently married Henry is accused by his mother-in-law of seeing a showgirl, the ex-girlfriend of a close friend. Manservant Joy attempts to help matters with a scheme involving Henry posing as his own double.

metadata.Plot: Recently married Henry is accused by his mother-in-law of seeing a showgirl, the ex-girlfriend of a close friend. Manservant Joy (Gus McNaughton) attempts to help matters with a scheme involving Henry posing as his own double.
metadata.Actors: Gus McNaughton, Jerry Verno, Molly Lamont
